    Frequently Asked Questions

    How quickly will I receive a response?

    Response times vary by plan: Free users get responses within 48-72 hours, Pro users within 24 hours, and Enterprise customers within 4 hours.

    Do you offer phone support?

    Phone support is available exclusively for Enterprise customers with 24/7 availability. All other users can reach us via email or live chat.

    Can you help with API integration?

    Absolutely! Our team can provide guidance on API integration, documentation, and best practices for implementing our service.

    What about billing questions?

    For billing inquiries, subscription changes, or payment issues, contact us at billing@microjpeg.com for fastest resolution.
